data.title: Mohit Shares An Adorable Pic With Wifey Sanaya Irani And Clearly This 'Jodi' Is Made In Heaven
meta_keywords: sanaya irani barun sobti. sanaya irani instagram
iss pyaar ko kya naam doon
data.meta_description: Mohit Sehgal and Sanaya Irani are one of the most loved couples of the television world. Here are the top pictures of the couple that prove their match was made in heaven.
data.text:
Mohit Sehgal and Sanaya Irani are one of the cutest couples of the television world. The two first met on the sets of their show, Miley Jab Hum Tum where Mohit played the bad boy of college and Sanaya played a simple girl from a small town.

Their Jodi was loved by the viewers but who knew they would get together for real. In real life, Mohit and Sanaya are exact opposites of what they played on the show. While Sanaya has this very frank and bubbly nature, Mohit is an introvert.

The two became really good friends on the show and soon they decided to take the next step. The two got married in Goa on January 25, 2015. Ever since then the two have been giving us couple goals! Thanks to Instagram that keeps giving us a dose of their beautiful relationship.

So recently, Mohit Sehgal shared a really happy picture with Sanaya and captioned it, "Happy is the man who finds a true friend, and far happier is he who finds that true friend in his wife . @sanayairani ♥️" Their beautiful picture is full of love, we see it in their eyes and feel this match was made in heaven!

Well, talking about Sanaya and Mohit, let's take you through some more adorable pictures of the couple that speaks of their fun and loving relationship.

What better than enjoying the morning breeze, all laid back with your partner? Mohit and Sanaya enjoying their getaway, giving some serious goals!

Don't Miss: TV Sweethearts Sanaya And Mohit Are Couple Goals

Sanaya and Mohit's holidays are incomplete without a refreshing session of spa. While the two were holidaying in Macao, they went for a spa session together!

Nothing like strolling through the beach, enjoying the soothing breeze, hand-in-hand with your partner. And yes, take notes, don't forget to take a selfie like Mohit and Sanaya.

Moments of laughs and love! Mohit and Sanaya are setting couple goals, each day, everyday!

Your collection of pictures is incomplete if you don't have a dramatic picture like this one with your partner. Mohit and Sanaya trying some typical movie drama on their vacay.

Cliche but this romantic pose is a must in a couple's photo book. Agree?

Aren't these two adorable?
